alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 4:38PM MST until March 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Mountain ranges of Pima, Santa Cruz and Cochise counties including the Chiricahua, Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca, Santa Rita, Catalina, Rincon and Baboquivari Mountains. * WHEN...In effect through 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
